traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The demon’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The demon’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). The demon can innately cast the following spells at will, requiring no material components: darkness, detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)

traits.name: Slimy Hide
traits.desc: The demon’s hide is extremely slick and oozes with slime. Creatures attempting to grapple the demon do so with disadvantage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The demon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can use its Spit Slime in place of the bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spit Slime
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its speed is reduced by half until the end of the demon’s next turn.
